summary: This CSS file is responsible for importing fonts and integrating Tailwind CSS into the project, providing a base, component, and utility layer for styling.
functionality: The file imports the Inter font and sets up Tailwind CSS by including its base, components, and utilities, which are essential for styling the project's UI components.
relationships: This file is likely included in the main entry point of the project's CSS, ensuring that all components benefit from the imported fonts and Tailwind CSS styles.
It relates to other CSS files or components that use Tailwind CSS classes for styling, as it provides the necessary setup for those styles to be applied.

identified_relationships.description: main.css references tailwind.config.js to apply Tailwind CSS configurations.
main.css is linked to index.html to apply styles to the HTML document.
main.css is referenced in vite.config.js for build configurations involving CSS processing.
